summary: MONKEYWORX COLLECTIVE website - industrial cyberpunk aesthetic with matte black background, neon green and hot pink accents. Features: team dossier grid, Holi Grail ticket tiers (5 levels from ₹449 to ₹78,999), corporate events page, hero video with glitch effects, and Swiggy Scenes booking integration.
architectural_notes: Industrial cyberpunk design: matte black (#000000) background with neon green (#39FF14) and hot pink (#FF69B4) accents
Typography: Industrial sans-serif and monospaced system fonts for technical aesthetic
Glitch effects throughout UI for cyberpunk atmosphere
Responsive design for team grid, ticketing tiers, and events sections
Card-style UI components with neon glow effects for cyberpunk aesthetic
Logo positioning at top as primary branding element with enhanced visibility
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Add cyberpunk neon glow effects to the MonkeyWorx logo with enhanced contrast (monkeyworx-logo.png > monkeyworx-logo-neon.png)
- Transform Holi Grail poster into card-style design with neon border glow and improved text visibility (holi-grail-poster.png > holi-grail-card.png)

existing_features.title: Establish global design system with matte black (#000000) background, neon green (#39FF14) and hot pink (#FF69B4) accent colors, industrial sans-serif and monospaced system fonts throughout the application
Create hero section with autoplay video background showing strobe-lit warehouse rave footage
Implement floating sticky navigation menu that remains visible on scroll

Create Team section displaying 4 members (Vikram - Founder/Chief Visionary, Sunny - Head of Vigilance & Hospitality, Dev - Tactical Lead/Operations, Aleena - Media & Communications) in a tactical dossier grid layout with monochrome glitch portrait placeholders

Build Holi Grail Ticketing Protocol section with 5 ticket tiers: THE NOMADS (₹449 - Entry Only), THE SEEKERS (₹1,149-₹1,699 - Entry + 1 Beer + 1 Color Packet, phased pricing), THE ALCHEMISTS (₹2,249 - Priority Entry + 2 Beers + Unlimited Colors), KING'S COURT VIP Table for 5 (₹44,999 - Elevated Deck + 1 Bottle + Starters + Service + Security + Unlimited Colors), KING'S COURT VIP Table for 10 (₹78,999 - Same as 5-person with 2 Bottles)

Create Corporate & Events page with headline 'PROFESSIONAL GRADE CHAOS', listing services (Concerts, Weddings, Corporate Parties, Private Events), corporate perks section mentioning bulk discounts, and contact CTA with phone number +91 63633 53339
Implement glitch animation effect on all interactive buttons that triggers on hover
Add prominent CTA button labeled 'BOOK TICKETS VIA SWIGGY SCENES' that links to Swiggy Scenes booking page

Transform the Holi Grail poster into a card-style booking component with cyberpunk neon glow effects, border highlighting, and elevated card styling that matches the existing neon green (#39FF14) and hot pink (#FF69B4) color scheme
Relocate the MonkeyWorx logo to the top of the page as the primary branding element and add neon glow effects that match the cyberpunk aesthetic
Adapt the Holi Grail poster design to full cyberpunk styling with improved color arrangement and visibility, ensuring text and elements stand out against the dark background
Fix front page subheading text visibility issues by improving color contrast and ensuring all text elements are clearly readable against the dark background
Update the Swiggy Scenes ticket booking link from the current URL to https://r.swiggy.com/v1/swiggy/scenes/comms/100052615 across all booking CTAs
Add the Instagram handle @monkeyworxcollective to the footer social media section and ensure it links to the correct Instagram profile

new_feature_requests.summary: Team dossier grid with monochrome glitch portraits for 4 team members
Holi Grail ticketing protocol page with 5 tier levels and pricing
Corporate events page with services list and contact CTA
Hero video section with strobe-lit warehouse rave footage
Glitch animation effects on button hover states
Primary CTA button linking to Swiggy Scenes booking
Transform Holi Grail poster into glowing card-style booking tab with cyberpunk neon effects
Move MonkeyWorx logo to top of page as primary branding with neon glow effects
Fix front page subheading text visibility and color contrast
